sect1.title: Getting your &scc; Organization Credentials (Mirroring Credentials)
sect1.para:
Start a Web browser and navigate to . On the &scc; (SCC) login page, log in to view your organization credentials and see all entitlements for your registered systems. If you have not yet registered a system or do not have a &suse; account, create a new account by following the Create an account link. After creating a new user account, you must register a system before using &susemgr;. On the &scc; Web page, activate the Organization tab to get your Organization Credentials (mirroring credentials) needed to access the channels for your &suse; products.
For information about SCC, refer to the SCC help available at .
